replies.msg:
今次係輸在法援法律TEAM。

林浩雲個judgment有好有段都講，點解你唔咁樣咁樣告，咁樣告先有得諗。 大把理據可以用來JR，但方向錯咗，好難嬴。個官都劃公仔劃出腸。

林浩雲與周家明比，根本係兩個唔同LEVEL。周家明的判詞一般毫無說服力。林浩雲呢個JUDGMENT唔係咁。
https://legalref.judiciary.hk/lrs/common/ju/ju_frame.jsp?DIS=126139&currpage=T

例子如下，最好睇整個JUDGMENT。
"2. It is appropriate to make clear at the outset that the present application is not about whether the police should have applied for the warrant, or whether the magistrate should have granted the warrant, or whether the warrant should be set aside.

"24.... At the hearing, however, Mr Robert Pang SC, appearing for the applicant, confirmed that he was not contending for a general rule that prior notice of an application for a search warrant on an institution such as a hospital or a bank should be given to the person whose information is contained in the documents targeted. Nor do I understand the applicant to maintain the proposition found in the Form 86 as a general rule that in such a case, the magistrate should be invited, in the ex parte application for the warrant, to impose conditions for the sealing of those records until an application is made by that person to set aside the warrant.[6] Likewise, Mr Pang disavowed any general contention that in such a case, having obtained a search warrant, the police are required to notify the person of it before taking steps to execute it so that the person has an opportunity of making an application to set it aside."

"26. The position taken on behalf of the applicant is thus one of strict entitlement. There is no submission advanced for her on the basis that the decision impugned should be quashed because the Commissioner had a discretion which he exercised in a Wednesbury unreasonable manner[8] or without taking into account relevant considerations, and I express no opinion on the merits of such bases."

replies.msg:
巴打的大方向，大家理解一致。我再補充：

4 . 覆核案只係challenge點解唔將warrant顯示比K睇，無再challenge其他野 (判詞第一段)

5. 覆核案無challenge差佬是否應取得warrange; 無challenge 裁判官是否應批出warrant; 無challenge是否應將warrant作廢(判詞第二段)

6. 法官話明明程序初期個覆核範圍都好闊下，但後期就收窄咗好多。個官都唔明點解K律師咁做 (判詞第二十四段)

7. 現時法律係，Warrant係有人要求就係SHOW，但K不在醫院現場，無人要求出示Warrant(判詞第三十七段)

8. 正確程序係差佬要搜查，當事人睇下個warrant包括咩，就比差佬攞，之後封存。當事人再決定是否challenge個warrant (呢段係我自己的)

9. 無Warrant唔比入屋，係因為要保障屋主，無人可以強行進入及侵權，這與醫院文件涉及病人私隱有別(判詞第三十九段)

10. 病人私隱要有更佳保障，先要從立法入手（即係，個官唔能夠創造法律）(判詞第四十三段)

11. K個律師淨係話，差佬唔比K知道個WARRANT，令到K無right of access to the courts。個官話" applicant has not pointed to any actual legal obstruction. "暗示K個律師都比唔夠料，淨係引用基本法35條唔夠，無引用足夠案例支持（判詞第五十五段）。
